item.title: The Weekend Appraisal Playbook That Saved My Conforming Rate Credit
item.description: When the appraisal on our conforming purchase landed $18,000 under contract, my lenderâ€™s email felt like a gut punch. They warned that our carefully negotiated rate credit could disappear unless we paid points or brought more cash. Instead of panicking, I devoted an entire weekend to a structured appraisal playbook that protected our credit, preserved the rate, and even sped up underwriting. Here is exactly what I did between Friday night and Monday morning.
